title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Critical Thinking-Based Mathematics Education for Health Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and general understanding of health management
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze health-related statistical data to derive meaningful patterns

Learners identify three numerical problems (e.g., calorie calculation, exercise intensity settings) in daily health contexts (diet, exercise) and create checklists by concretizing three-step solutions for each problem.
Learners can logically present interpretations of health data in a virtual collaborative environment with peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
